body_html:
While I agree with the principle, pytorch is by no mean the only offender (scikit-learn come to mind) and that kind of changes would break a lot of code.
Then again, maybe such breakage would be manageable within the context of 1.0 migration.

body:
While I agree with the principle, pytorch is by no mean the only offender (scikit-learn come to mind) and that kind of changes would break a lot of code.
Then again, maybe such breakage would be manageable within the context of 1.0 migration.
